abstract: DealBook Online; Jason P W Halperin, assistant United States attorney in Southern District of New York, is leaving to join Gibson, Dunn & Crutcher.
lead_paragraph: Jason P.W. Halperin, who won all of his 13 cases as an assistant United States attorney in the Southern District of New York, is joining a law firm.

headline.main: Terror and Corruption Prosecutor Leaves for Private Sector

snippet: Jason P.W. Halperin, who won all of his 13 cases as an assistant United States attorney in the Southern District of New York, is joining a law firm.
